attributes.action: Give A Pay Rise To All NHS Workers
attributes.additional_details:
Throughout the pandemic the NHS has struggled, nurses and doctors have been overworked, some have gotten I'll and some have died. And in return, we clapped for them once a week?

MPs have sat idle throughout, some even taking a pay rise themselves.

It's about time those on the front line get the pay rise they deserve. This should also include those visiting private residences.
attributes.background: The wages if all NHS workers should be increased to repay them for all the hard work they've done throughout the pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Increase pay for all NHS staff by 15%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565151

We should increase the pay of our NHS staff by 25%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/563356
